title: First win of the day timer
body: Is there a way without using the old client to get a precise countdown when first win of the day is ready instead of only hours?

replies.body: Well the old client is gone and i still dont figure why they dont give accurate timer for the first win of the day in the profile window when you can see it in the after match window...
Does that mean that at some point we will be able to get an accurate timer with the new client or is it another feature loss? (Like the lack of individual gold in the new spectate mode)

Not every feature is available through the updated client yet, so in some cases you may need to return to the legacy client:

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher"

Beyond that, you can also set a personal time for yourself if you like for 24 hours.  I hope that helps!
